Manual

Step by step introduction to using shinyLimma

Cool, but how does it work?

shinyLimma is based on the very powerful, and very popular Limma package.

If you're interested in learning more about my motivation for making it, you can check out my blog entry on it here.

I think this website looks pretty, and hosting the entire thing here would really muck it up, so you can find the manual (rendered in an easy-on-the-eyes markdown document) here .
